projects.title: ChallenGeo
projects.description: Simple geo quiz app which not only provides info on countries (flags, population, capital city, currency, languages and so on) but also has a quiz in which the user has to choose to which country the displayed flag, capital city, etc. corresponds to.

projects.title: Wordish
projects.description: Wordish sends a new word to your Android phone once a day. Users are able to set when they want to get the notification, which consists of the word itself with its pronunciation, a definition and a couple examples of the word being used in context.

projects.title: Smartline
projects.description: Minimalistic, intuitive and comprehensive news platform for managing digital content online in a fast and straightforward way. It consists of a control panel for content contribution, a RESTful API and a web and native Android app for final users.

projects.title: Light Switch
projects.description: This is a simple home automation tool that relies on HTTP requests being sent back and forth from an Android app to a Python script running on a Raspberry Pi to remotely turn lights or other devices on and off.
